snippet: Angela Merkel, the German chancellor, has sent Hans-Joachim Fuchtel, a jovial, brass-band-loving Black Forester, to Greece to help mend frayed relations.
abstract: German chancellor Angela Merkel appoints Hans-Joachim Fuchtel as emissary to Greece to help mend frayed relations; efforts, if successful, could help the ailing country be more efficient, and help pull Greece's economy out of a deep and protracted recession, despite uncertainty surrounding the nation and the entire euro zone.

byline.contributor: Dimitris Bounias contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Angela Merkel, the German chancellor, has sent Hans-Joachim Fuchtel, a jovial, brass-band-loving Black Forester, to Greece to help mend frayed relations.

headline.seo: Angela Merkel Sends Envoy to Greece to Mend Ties
headline.main: German Envoy Goes to Greece, Leaving Lectures Behind
headline.print_headline: German Envoy Goes to Greece, Leaving Lectures Behind
